state: Welcome to TextWorld! Your first objective is to venture north. And then, travel north. And then, venture east. Following that, attempt to go to the east. That done, go to the south. And then, attempt to go west. Next, venture north. Okay, and then, head north. After that, take a trip west. And then, move west. Then, make an effort to move south. With that done, attempt to take a trip south. Then, go east. With that accomplished, attempt to go to the north. If you can succeed at that, lift the coin from the floor of the salon.
